service_details.title: What we offer in Service Mesh Consulting?

sections.title: Service Mesh Consulting & Advisory
sections.description: Our team of service mesh consultants assess your current microservice landscape, identify potential bottlenecks and security vulnerabilities.
offerings: Accordingly, we advise a detailed roadmap and actionable deployment plan to reach your organizational goals.
Service mesh consulting report also includes the industry best practices, choosing right service mesh for your use case, etc.

sections.title: Service Mesh Deployment
sections.description: Leverage our experience to choose and deploy the right service mesh for secured service to service communication.
offerings: We have expertise on every major service mesh for installing on Kubernetes with zero downtime whether it is Istio, Linkerd or Consul.
Encrypt the whole traffic end to end in the infrastructure & applications including VMs or K8s clusters.

sections.title: Configuring Service Mesh
sections.description: Integrating with monitoring, tracing, and alerting tools offers a service mesh dashboard with a 360° view to observe the behavior of services.
offerings: The dashboard enables pinpointing issues across your containerized applications and troubleshoot them.
Understand how applications communicate with each other and manage traffic independently.

sections.title: Service Mesh Commercial Support & Training
sections.description: Enterprise support from an experienced team of service mesh architects, & engineers to fix any networking issues in your microservices landscape and build in-house teams.
offerings: Assured ongoing assistance for regular service mesh version updates, patches, and rapid releases.
Our certified experts mentor your team on making the necessary cultural changes and implementing best practices.
We’re on your side and completely vendor neutral - your service mesh implementation partner.

large_preview_cards.title: Implement Istio, Linkerd, or Consul from the Service Mesh Experts

items.title: Istio Experts
items.description: InfraCloud is Istio's officially recognized professional services partner. Our certified experts manage your entire service mesh adoption journey - right from assessment, advisory, and roadmap to successful Istio implementation. With deep service mesh expertise, our Istio consultants can help you with your Istio configurations, operational issues, training, and ongoing managed enterprise support. We become your extended team providing third party support.

items.title: Linkerd Experts
items.description: Whether you’re looking to deploy Linkerd or need on-demand support, our Linkerd experts can assist you. Post implementation training by Linkerd architects and consultants help you build the in-house Linkerd expertise. InfraCloud’s Linkerd service mesh third party support include configuration, integration with observability tools, security policy development, & ongoing maintenance. As an officially recognized Linkerd commercial support partner, we got you covered for everything related to Linkerd.

items.title: Consul Experts
items.description: With Consul as your service mesh, our experts help you design architecture, deploy and provide enterprise support to enhance communication between various services of an app. Ensuring the communication between services is secured by encryption and authorization methods. With our managed support for Consul, our experts help you encrypt the service to service communication, discover services and provide real-time health checks.
